data.text:
At STIGA, we are a leading global manufacturer and distributor of garden power equipment. Grounded in over a century of heritage, engineering and sustainability are at the core of our work alongside a unique professional know-how and deep passion for green spaces. Indeed, at STIGA, we pair incomparable technical garden expertise with world-class research and innovation excellence, working tirelessly to identify new opportunities based on emerging and growing trends to create products that transform the way people around the world interact with the outdoors. The Group has five brands which, collectively, represent more than 100 years of experience in this sector. In addition to the premium Stiga brand, the Alpina, Mountfield, Castelgarden and Atco brands also belong to the Group. The STIGA Group sells more than one million gardening machines every year and operates in 89 countries around the world. STIGA employs a workforce of more than 1,500 people and has three production facilities - one at its central office in Castelfranco Veneto (Treviso), one in Slovakia and one in China - and 16 sales offices in Europe.

Website

https://corporate.stiga.com/

External link for STIGA

Industry

Consumer Goods

Company size

1,001-5,000 employees

Headquarters

Castelfranco Veneto, Treviso

Type

Privately Held

Founded

1934

Specialties

Battery, electric and petrol lawn mowers, lawn tractors and front mowers, Robotic mowers for automatic lawn mowing, and Other powered gardening products as brushcutters, hedgecutters, trimmers, chainsaws, blowers, scarifiers, tillers and snow throwers.
